sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div.head-content
    p.font-style-regular.font-desc.index-content {{ index_content + 1 }}
    p.font-style-semi-bold.font-title.type-content {{ type }}
    div.icon-handlebar
        handlebar
    div.icon-dropdown-material
        dropdown-material(
            :items="options" 
            @onChange="onClickDropdown"
            :disabled="disabled"
        )
</template>

<script>
import Handlebar from 'icon/Handlebar.svg'
import DropdownMaterial from '@/components/Dropdown/DropdownMaterial.vue'

export default {
    props: {
        index_content: Number,
        type: String,
        options: {
            type: Array,
            default: []
        },
        disabled: Boolean
    },
    data() {
        return {
        }
    },
    components: {
        Handlebar,
        DropdownMaterial
    },
    methods: {
        onClickDropdown: function(index) {
            if (this.disabled) 
                return;
            this.$emit('onSelect', index);
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">

@import "@/assets/styles/variables.sass"

.head-content
    position: relative
    background-color: $blue-light
    padding: 14px 0 14px 0
    width: 100%
    border-bottom: 1px solid $grey10
    .index-content
        display: inline-block
        margin: 0px 10px 0 14px
        padding: 1px 5px 0px 5px
        background-color: $white
        border-radius: 30px
        min-width: 25px
        text-align: center
        font-feature-settings: 'tnum'
        -webkit-font-feature-settings: 'tnum'
        -moz-font-feature-settings: 'tnum'
    .type-content
        margin-right: 40px
        //width: 310px
        display: inline-block
    .icon-handlebar
        position: absolute
        padding: 15px 20px 15px 20px
        //height: 10px
        //padding: 20px
        //margin: 0px 361px 0 0
        top: 0px
        left: 379px 
    .icon-dropdown-material
        position: absolute
        top: 10px
        right: 14px
        .el-dropdown
            height: 30px
            .el-dropdown-selfdefine
                .my_svg
                    .action-icon--
                        fill: $grey33
                &:hover
                    .my_svg
                        .action-icon--
                            fill: rgba($blue-dark, .7) 

            
        .activate_dropdown
            .el-dropdown-selfdefine
                .my_svg
                    .action-icon--
                        fill: $blue-dark 
                &:hover
                    .my_svg
                        .action-icon--
                            fill: $blue-dark 
</style>
